^.//: mnemonic: the topmost is the best. see also 'u' which marks a superlative form

>.#: '-(i)er' comparative suffix; agent suffix. see also 'c' which marks a comparative form

g.//: mnemonic: 'genitive' is a similar concept to 'possessive'

l.//: see also A: auxiliary verb property

x.//: 'xxx' used to be a placeholder for swear words

0.//: mnemonic: the closest digit to single '1' that's not used for grammatical person

9.//: mnemonic: the biggest, most plural digit

c.//: see also '>' which derives a comparative form

u.//: see also '^' which derives a superlative form

*.//: so we can do verb agreement

A.//: see also l: linking verb property

@.//: mnemonic: at symbol resembles an 'a' inside a 'C'

t.#: verb preterite / simple past form property

h.#: verb third person singular present form property
